t: Amazon Belleville YGK-1
s: YGK-1 is an XLFC (Extra Large Fulfillment Centre) project located on a 102-acre site just south of the 401 in Belleville, Ontario. The building stands at approximately 45ft tall, with a 19,820 sq.ft. office and 1,030,027 sq.ft. warehouse.
